property.pkpcolortype.name: Signaltype
property.pkpcolortype.desc: The signal type can be changed here. There are semi automatic main signals, semi automatic main and distant signals, block signals with 2, 3 and 4 states, shunting signals, shunting dwarf signals and level crossing warning signals.
property.pkplightbar.name: Lightbar
property.pkpspeed.name: Additional signal (outdated)
property.pkpdistantsign.name: Distant signal sign
property.pkpdistantsign.desc: Distant signal sign for marking a distant signal
property.pkpw18.name: Distant signal equivalency
property.pkpw18.desc: Forewarning signal equivalency mounted at last automatic block signal
property.pkpsemiautonear.name: Near signal
property.pkpsemiautonear.desc: Main signal without distant signal function
property.pkpsemiautoneardist.name: Near and distant signal
property.pkpsemiautoneardist.desc: Main signal with distant signal function
property.pkpautotwo.name: 2-state ABS
property.pkpautotwo.desc: Auto block signal with 2 states. Proceed and stop
property.pkpautothree.name: 3-state ABS
property.pkpautothree.desc: Auto block signal with 3 states. Proceed and stop and stop at the next signal
property.pkpautofour.name: 4-state ABS
property.pkpautofour.desc: Auto block signal with 4 states. Proceed > 2 blocks free, proceed and stop and expect stop at the next signal
property.pkpdistant.name: Distant signal
property.pkpdistant.desc: Indicates what to expect at the next main signal.
property.pkpdistantrepeat.name: Repeater signal
property.pkpdistantrepeat.desc: Repeat the distant signal if the main signal cannot be seen from a proper distance.
property.pkpshunting.name: Shunting signal
property.pkpshuntingdwarf.name: Shunting dwarf signal
property.pkplevelcrossing.name: Level crossing warning
property.pkplevelcrossing.desc: Level crossing warning signals indicate whether a following level crossing is secured.
property.pkpw21.name: W21 - Speed indicator
property.pkpw21.desc: Indicates the speed that may be driven through the following switch area.
property.pkpw24.name: W24 - Wrong track indicator
property.pkpw24.desc: Indicates whether the route leads into the wrong track.
property.pkprepeater.name: Repeater
property.pkprepeater.desc: Indicates which repeater the signal is.
property.pkpw19.name: W19 - Short distance
property.pkpw19.desc: Short distance between next two signals.
property.pkpw20.name: W20 - Short distance
